InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.

Manufacturer: Vanduul / Esperia
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

This laser repeater is typically found on Vanduul war ships and is commonly known by its UEE Navy designation of 'WASP'.

InstalledItem.Name: AllStop
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Gorgon Defender Industries
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Gorgon Defender Industries first created the AllStop shield generator to hold off the Vanduul. They worked so well that many military crafts were known to prefer the AllStop. Just one of the many reasons to have one on your ship.

InstalledItem.Name: IcePlunge
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Competition

When you’re pushing your ship to the limit during that frantic last lap, you’ll be glad you have ACOM’s IcePlunge to keep things cool.

InstalledItem.Name: Charger
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: D
Class: Military

The Aegis Charger has powered military fighters for generations. Tried and tested in the most demanding of situations, the Charger can handle sudden or sustained power draws with ease.
